navigation_overview: The website has a sign-in page as the entry point. After login, users see a left-hand navigation menu with: Accounts Overview (default dashboard), Open New Account, Transfer Funds, Bill Pay, Request Loan, Update Contact Info, Manage Cards, Investments, Account Statements, Security Settings, Support Center, and Log Out. Public pages: Login, Register, Forgot Password.

modules.title: Login
modules.description:
The login page contains a login form with two required input fields—Email/Username and Password—along with a 'Sign In' button and a 'Forgot Password?' link.

UI Elements:
- Email/Username input field (required, must be valid email format)
- Password input field (required, at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character)
- Sign In button
- Register link
- Forgot Password? link

Validation:
- Email must be a valid email format
- Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
- Successful login flashes 'Signed in successfully.' and redirects to Accounts Overview
- Failed login shows 'Incorrect email or password. Please try again,' clears the password field

modules.title: Register
modules.description:
The registration page presents a sign-up form.

UI Elements:
- First Name (required)
- Last Name (required)
- Street Address (required)
- City (required)
- State dropdown (required, all US states)
- ZIP Code (required)
- Phone Number (required, format: (123) 456-7890 with auto-formatting)
- Social Security Number (required, format: 123-45-6789 with auto-formatting)
- Username (required, must be valid email format)
- Password (required, at least 8 characters)
- Confirm Password (required, must match Password)
- Register button

Validation:
- Username must be valid email format
- Phone Number must follow (123) 456-7890 format
- ZIP Code must be 5 digits or 5+4 format (12345 or 12345-6789)
- SSN must follow 123-45-6789 format
- Password must be at least 8 characters
- Confirm Password must match Password
- All required fields must be filled
- Success shows 'Account created successfully — please sign in' and redirects to login page
- Failures display specific field-level errors

modules.title: Accounts Overview
modules.description:
Dashboard showing all customer accounts.

UI Elements:
- Welcome message with user's name
- Table with columns: Account Number, Account Type, Current Balance, Account Status (Active badge), Open Date
- Total balance displayed in footer row
- Account numbers are clickable (not implemented yet)
- Account numbers masked showing only last 4 digits (e.g., ****5001)

Behavior:
- Shows all accounts belonging to logged-in user
- Rows ordered by account creation date (earliest first)
- Balance shows current balance
- Account numbers masked for security

modules.title: Open New Account
modules.description:
Account opening page with interactive form.

UI Elements:
- Account type selection cards (Checking or Savings) showing features and minimum deposit requirements
- Initial Deposit Amount field (required, numeric)
- Funding Source Account dropdown (required)
- Open Account button

Business Rules:
- Account type must be selected
- Deposit amount must be numeric and meet minimums: $25 for Checking, $100 for Savings
- Funding account must have sufficient balance
- Real-time validation errors displayed
- Success shows 'Account opened successfully!' and redirects to accounts overview

modules.title: Transfer Funds
modules.description:
Transfer money between accounts.

UI Elements:
- Transfer type radio buttons: My ParaBank Account or External Account
- Transfer Amount field (required, numeric)
- Source Account dropdown (required, filtered to Checking and Savings only)
- For internal transfers: Destination Account dropdown (user's own accounts)
- For external transfers: Account Number input and Confirm Account Number input

Business Rules:
- Transfer amount must be valid and positive
- Must have sufficient funds in source account
- For external transfers, account numbers must match
- Cannot transfer to same account (internal)
- Success shows 'Transfer completed successfully.' with transaction ID
- Failures show contextual errors: 'Insufficient funds' or 'Account numbers do not match'

modules.title: Bill Pay
modules.description:
Pay bills to payees.

UI Elements:
- Payee Name input (required)
- Street Address input (required)
- City input (required)
- State input (required)
- ZIP Code input (required)
- Phone Number input (required)
- Payee Account Number input (required)
- Confirm Account Number input (required, must match Payee Account Number)
- Payment Amount input (required, numeric)
- Source Account dropdown (required)
- Pay button

Validation:
- All required fields must be filled
- Account numbers must match
- Amount must be positive
- Sufficient balance required in source account
- Success shows 'Payment submitted successfully.' with reference code and updates balances
- Errors displayed inline: 'Account numbers do not match', 'Insufficient funds'

modules.title: Request Loan
modules.description:
Apply for a loan.

UI Elements:
- Interactive loan type cards: Personal, Auto, Home (with interest rates displayed)
- Loan Amount field (required, numeric, type-specific ranges: Personal $1,000-$50,000, Auto $5,000-$75,000, Home $50,000-$500,000)
- Down Payment Amount field (required, numeric)
- Collateral Account dropdown (required)
- Apply button

Business Rules:
- Loan amount must be within type-specific range
- Down payment must be less than loan amount
- Sufficient collateral funds required
- 20% collateral value requirement
- Credit engine simulates 80% approval rate with 10% minimum down payment
- Success shows 'Loan approved and created successfully!' with account details
- Denial shows specific reasons: 'Insufficient credit history' or 'Inadequate collateral value'
- Note: No actual balance debits occur in this mock system

modules.title: Update Contact Info
modules.description:
Update user profile information.

UI Elements:
- First Name input (required, pre-filled)
- Last Name input (required, pre-filled)
- Street Address input (required, pre-filled)
- City input (required, pre-filled)
- State input (required, pre-filled)
- ZIP Code input (required, pre-filled)
- Phone Number input (optional, pre-filled)
- Update Profile button

Behavior:
- Form pre-populated with current user data
- All required fields must remain filled
- Success shows 'Profile updated successfully.' and refreshes data
- Failures highlight invalid fields with inline error banner

modules.title: Manage Cards
modules.description:
Card management page with two forms.

Form 1 - Request New Card:
- Card Type selection (Debit or Credit)
- Account to Link dropdown (required)
- Shipping Address input (required, must be complete)
- Request Card button
- Success shows 'Card request submitted successfully.' with tracking ID

Form 2 - Card Controls:
- Select Existing Card dropdown
- New Spending Limit input (numeric)
- Travel Notice: optional date range and destination fields
- Card Status toggle (Active or Frozen)
- Update Controls button
- Validates numeric limits, date ranges, and allowable card-status transitions
- Success shows 'Card controls updated successfully.'
- Validation failures (e.g., limit above policy) appear inline

modules.title: Investments
modules.description:
Investment management page with multiple sections.

Section 1 - Portfolio Snapshot (read-only):
- Current fund holdings
- Market value
- Unrealised gain or loss

Section 2 - Trade Funds Form:
- Action selection (Buy or Sell)
- Fund Symbol input (autocomplete)
- Quantity input (required, must be > 0)
- Funding/Destination Account dropdown
- Execute Trade button
- Validates symbol exists, quantity > 0, sufficient buying power or share balance
- Success shows 'Trade executed successfully.' with order ID

Section 3 - Recurring Investment Plan Form:
- Fund Symbol input
- Contribution Amount input (required, must meet minimum)
- Frequency selection (Weekly or Monthly)
- Start Date input (required, must be in the future)
- Funding Account dropdown
- Create Plan button
- Validates start date is future, contribution meets minimum, adequate funding balance
- Success shows 'Plan created successfully.'
- Errors highlight problematic fields (e.g., 'Start date must be in the future')

modules.title: Account Statements
modules.description:
Statement generation and preferences page.

Form 1 - Generate Statement:
- Statement Period: month-and-year or custom date range
- Account dropdown (required)
- Generate Statement button
- Validates dates and retrieves relevant transactions
- Success shows 'Statement generated successfully.'
- Failure shows 'Unable to generate statement — please try again later.'

Form 2 - e-Statement Preferences:
- Checkbox to opt into paperless statements
- Email Address input (required when opted in)
- Save Preference button
- Validates email address format
- Success shows 'e-Statement preference updated.'
- Failure highlights email field with guidance

modules.title: Security Settings
modules.description:
Security settings page with password change form.

UI Elements:
- Current Password input (required)
- New Password input (required)
- Confirm New Password input (required, must match New Password)
- Change Password button

Validation:
- Current password must be verified against stored credentials
- New password must follow strong-password policy (at least 8 characters, uppercase, lowercase, number, special character)
- Confirm New Password must match New Password
- Success shows 'Password changed successfully.'
- Validation errors highlight appropriate fields

modules.title: Support Center
modules.description:
Support page with two communication forms.

Form 1 - Secure Message:
- Subject input (required, length validated)
- Category dropdown (Account, Technical, Security, Other)
- Message Body (rich text, required)
- Attachment input (optional, file type validated)
- Send Message button
- Success shows 'Message sent successfully.' with ticket ID
- Failures display inline guidance

Form 2 - Schedule Callback:
- Reason for Call dropdown (required)
- Preferred Date input (required, must be at least next business day)
- Preferred Time Window input (required)
- Phone Number input (pre-filled, editable, format validated)
- Request Callback button
- Success shows 'Callback request submitted.' and sends email confirmation
- Validation errors shown inline

modules.title: Logout
modules.description:
Logout functionality accessible from the left navigation menu.

Behavior:
- Clicking 'Log Out' ends the user session
- Clears sensitive data
- Redirects to the login page
- After logout, accessing protected pages should redirect to login
